original: Sakiṁ nimuggo nimuggova hoti, ummujjitvā nimujjati, ummujjitvā ṭhito hoti, ummujjitvā
analyzed: sakim nimuggaḥ nimuggaḥ uva hoti ummujjitvā nimujjati ummujjitvā ṭhitaḥ hoti ummujjitvā

original: vipassati viloketi, ummujjitvā patarati, ummujjitvā patigādhappatto hoti, ummujjitvā
analyzed: vipassati viloketi ummujjitvā patarati ummujjitvā patigādhappatto hoti ummujjitvā

original: tiṇṇo hoti pāraṅgato thale tiṭṭhati brāhmaṇo.
analyzed: tiṇṇaḥ hoti pāraṅgataḥ thale tiṭṭhati brāhmaṇaḥ

original: Ubhatobhāgavimutto, paññāvimutto, kāyasakkhī, diṭṭhippatto, saddhāvimutto, dhammānusārī, saddhānusārī.
analyzed: ubhatobhāga vimutto paññā vimutto kāya sakkhī diṭṭhi ppatto saddhā vimutto dhamma anusārī saddhā anusārī
